lines.text: Maybe the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> bled himself over the body?
Or- no, the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> just bled himself!
There's a lot of blood there, Seeker. No way anyone loses that much and stays alive.
...So it's both! They each bled half that amount, to come up with enough to make it look fatal!
Even so, seems like a pretty desperate measure to me.
They'd still be puttin' their lives at risk, doin' it that way.
You sure they didn't have <c=#FF00FF>another source</c> lyin' around?
